price: 13. Kas yra jums, kad nepriskiriate Allahui (Jam priklausančios) didybės,
arabic: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: mā lakum lā tarjūna lillahi waqāran
